name: Blessed of Haull
flavorText: The Crusader Haull traveled with three others; Inhora, Drakon, and Roland. They shared knowledge and wine. While instructing his apprentice in the application of Justice the next day, Haull was struck by an insight, and set to work modifying his belt.
flavorTextHtml: The Crusader Haull traveled with three others; Inhora, Drakon, and Roland. They shared knowledge and wine. While instructing his apprentice in the application of Justice the next day, Haull was struck by an insight, and set to work modifying his belt.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: Justice spawns a Blessed Hammer when it hits an enemy. (Crusader Only)
secondary.text: Justice spawns a Blessed Hammer when it hits an enemy. (Crusader Only)
